I am giving this top 4 out of 5 because it really is a great top, it fits very comfortably. I docked a star only because the size was just a bit off. I wear a size 16 and had taken the advice of others that it would be best to size up so I choose the XXL it fits perfect! It is thicker than I thought it would be and the pockets are right on the sides but aren't unflattering. I do recommend this top!
LOVE IT!! Order a size up though!

This was thicker than I expected which was nice. Color was accurate.  I have wide hips, it actually has pockets and the pockets were right at the thickest part of my hips. This made them look bigger/worse so I sent it back.  I think it would have looked nice otherwise.
